PSCT.Base: You cannot Special Summon monsters, except Insect monsters. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Beetrooper Scout Buggy" from your hand, Deck, or GY. You can only use this effect of "Beetrooper Scout Buggy" once per turn.
